name: HEXAGONY (NixonBit)
description:
Hexagony is a super simple action hexagon-dodging game. 

There are 3 levels of dificulty: Normal, Hard and Hexagon. Each level has a different song in it.

The game is infinite. Try to reach as far as you can.

A hexagon is a six-sided polygon or 6-gon.

It's based on a famous game called Super Hexagon yet is original and interesting in its own way. Hope you enjoy it :)

Inspired by the video "MAKING A GAME IN 10 MINUTES!!" in Unity By BRACKEYS.

Music:
  • Eric Skiff - Arpanauts
  • Chipzel - When They Come For Us
  • Chipzel - Online
USE WASD OR ARROW KEYS TO MOVE Warning!

This video game features extensive use of stroboscopic effects and should not be played by individuals who are sensitive to intense flashing lights. If you experience dizziness, blurred vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of consciousness, disorientation, any involuntary movement or convulsion whilst playing HEXAGONY, discontinue use IMMEDIATELY and consult your doctor.

If you find any bugs or if you have a suggestion, put it in the comments and i will try to answer as fast a possible. You can also contact me at nixonbitcontact@gmail.com.
